DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect VX-770 Midazolam Rosiglitazone , effect Fluconazole VX-770 .
DOC.brief_title: Study VX-770 Midazolam Rosiglitazone Effect Fluconazole VX-770
DOC.criteria: Subjects must male female 18 55 year age . Subjects must judge good health . Subjects must body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 . History illness , opinion investigator subject 's general practitioner , might confound result study pose additional risk administer study drug ( ) subject . Subjects human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis C , active hepatitis B . Female subject female partner ( ) male subject pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant study within 90 day last dose study drug . History cardiovascular disease , hypoglycemia , edema .
